info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 2:38PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Elkhart, western Noble, northwestern Whitley and northeastern Kosciusko Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 237 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Syracuse, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... North Webster around 245 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Ligonier. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
